topic.title: Will Shadowsocks be safe in China?
topic.body: I heard that cops are searching shadowsocks users in Shenzhen

1_1Nrk2F3W5Kj7VJ7bqHeb25CVGJ21ejqauC.body: 感觉中文论坛人好少的说

2_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: Chinese government is destroying itself, it's impossible to ban everything in a period of Internet, and.... zeronet will be next battlefield, I think
